news.title: Pope appoints first woman to senior synod post
news.description: Nathalie Becquart is one of the two new undersecretaries named Saturday to the synod, where she has been a consultant since 2019.
news.author: AFP

news.title: 'Suffering' Nadal's Aussie Open in doubt with back injury
news.description: The world number two sat our Spain's ATP Cup campaign in warm-up week, and he hasn't played a competitive match since the ATP Finals in London in November.
news.author: AFP

news.title: Who are the pivotal figures in Trump's Senate trial?
news.description: Trump was impeached in December 2019 for abuse of power and obstruction of Congress, but he is being tried now for "incitement of insurrection" for his role in last month's deadly riot at the US Capitol.
news.author: AFP

news.title: Wet wet wet – more rainfall expected in Gauteng
news.description: A yellow moderate level two warning has been issued for disruptive rainfall. Motorist have been urged to drive carefully as flooding was expected in some areas.
news.author: Veronica Mokhoali

news.title: 6.0-magnitude quake hits southern Philippines
news.description: The 6.0-magnitude quake struck the town of Bansalan on Mindanao island at 12:22 pm (0422 GMT), the USGS said in a bulletin.
news.author: AFP

news.title: Thousands rally again in Myanmar against military coup
news.description: The fresh rally followed the largest protests to date on Saturday, when tens of thousands came out in cities across the country to condemn the coup that brought a 10-year experiment with democracy to a crashing halt.
news.author: AFP

news.title: ANC resumes Masuku, Diko disciplinary hearing after January postponement
news.description: Bandile Masuku and Khusela Diko were hauled before the disciplinary committee after allegations of impropriety in the awarding of a PPE tender. The hearing was delayed due to requests for new documents and records.
news.author: Edwin Ntshidi

news.title: A design framework for actively crosslinked filament networks
news.description:
Living matter moves, deforms, and organizes itself. In cells this is made possible by networks of
polymer filaments and crosslinking molecules that connect filaments to each other and that act as
motors to do mechanical work on the network. For the case of highly cross-linked filament networks,
we d...
news.author: Sebastian Fürthauer, Daniel J Needleman and Michael J Shelley

news.title: A reinforcement learning approach to rare trajectory sampling
news.description:
Very often when studying non-equilibrium systems one is interested in analysing dynamical behaviour
that occurs with very low probability, so called rare events . In practice, since rare events are by
definition atypical, they are often difficult to access in a statistically significant way. What ar...
news.author: Dominic C Rose, Jamie F Mair and Juan P Garrahan

news.title: Unique superdiffusion induced by directionality in multiplex networks
news.description:
The multilayer network framework has served to describe and uncover a number of novel and unforeseen
physical behaviors and regimes in interacting complex systems. However, the majority of existing
studies are built on undirected multilayer networks while most complex systems in nature exhibit
direc...

news.title: Laser cooling and electronic structure studies of CaK and its ions CaK ±
news.description:
Aiming at a laser cooling investigation, we have used ab initio complete active space self
consistent field (CASSCF)/(MRCI +Q) calculations to study the electronic structure of the diatomic
molecule CaK and its molecular ions CaK + and CaK − . The potential energy curves and the static
dipole moment...

news.title: Defects and dopants in zinc-blende aluminum arsenide: a first-principles study
news.description:
AlAs is a semiconductor that can form heterostructure, superlattice, and ternary alloy with GaAs. We
systematically investigate the formation energies, transition energy levels, as well as defect and
carrier densities of intrinsic defects and extrinsic impurities in AlAs using first-principles
simul...
news.author: Jiangming Cao, Menglin Huang, Dingrong Liu, Zenghua Cai, Yu-Ning Wu, Xiang Ye and Shiyou Chen
